headline: UBS Maintains Neutral on Moody’s Corporation (MCO) Following Q4 Earnings Release
summary: Moody’s Corporation (NYSE:MCO) is among the 20 Best Investments in 2026. Moody’s Corporation (NYSE:MCO) is among the best investments on our list. TheFly reported on February 19 that UBS reduced its price target on MCO to $490 from $515 and maintained a Neutral rating, reflecting adjustments to its model after the company’s fourth-quarter earnings release. […]

headline: Private Credit's Liquidity Test
summary: Private credit has grown into a $2 trillion market, but as retail investors demand more liquidity, the structure is getting stress-tested. Marc Pinto, the Global Head of Private Credit at Moodys joined Bloomberg Open Interest to talk about the scrutiny surrounding liquidity risks in private credit.

raw.headline: Private Credit's Liquidity Test
raw.summary: Private credit has grown into a $2 trillion market, but as retail investors demand more liquidity, the structure is getting stress-tested. Marc Pinto, the Global Head of Private Credit at Moodys joined Bloomberg Open Interest to talk about the scrutiny surrounding liquidity risks in private credit.

headline: Full-year 2025 results
summary: Solid 2025 resultsDebt reduction trajectory confirmedGrowth objectives for 2025-2028 All tables are available in the PDF. Successful plan to strengthen the financial position and confirmed debt reduction trajectory: Finalised €1 billion disposal plan at an average multiple of c.14X EBITDANormalised access to financing, with a €500 million bond issueReduction in net financial debt (excluding IFRS 16 and IAS 17) of €390 million compared to 31 December 2024, resulting in a decrease in Wholeco lever
